summary: Skyrim is definitely lacking in ecto-creatures so of course I decided to overshoot the good amount of ghosts to be added by about 10,000. That number is not even a joke.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim is definitely lacking in ecto-creatures so of course I decided to overshoot the good amount of ghosts to be added by about 10,000. That number is not even a joke. Good luck friend. DISCLAIMER: THIS WILL RUIN YOUR SAVES.

~5525 wisp added
~250 wispsmothers added
~1200 ghosts added
~274 magic anomalies added to roam skyrim
~97 mistmen added
~580 posessed deer added.



FOR A REAL CHALLENGE USE WITH
Mo' Daedra
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58258/?

Mo' Morrowind Monsters
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58030/?

And Empty Skyrim
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58230/?
author: adrian85858
